summary:
Simply multiplies carriage/ferry services by 5x,10x,20x.
Great for hardcore players who use no fast travel.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description[/b]
Simple mod that multiplies carriage/ferry services by 5x,10x,20x.
Great for hardcore players who use no fast travel.
This was inspired by an older mod, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11414]disable fast travel permanently[/url]

[b]Versions[/b]
• [[b]5x[/b]] - changes prices from 20/50 to 100/250
• [[b]10x[/b]] - changes to 200/500
• [[b]10x linear[/b]] - changes to 400/500
• [[b]20x[/b]] - changes to 400/1000

[b]Install[/b]
• Recommended to Install using nexus mod manager.
• Prices won\'t be shown in dialogue right away, however after traveling once they will update.
• For those without Dawnguard, an alternate version available that only changes carriages.

[b]Other recommendations for balanced economy[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22678]Disable Fast Travel[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8544]Expanded Carriage Service[/url] - add a few more carriages that were missing from the large towns.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16231]Increased Bounty/Guild Rewards[/url] - increases job rewards based on level/difficulty & optionally reduce fedex quest rewards.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24804]Harder Barter[/url] - fix inflation by capping sale to lower value.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14476]Expanded Apothecary Inventory[/url] - increased amount of potions/ingrediants without touching rare ones, this is great money sink.
author: svartberg

files.name: Expensive Transports - non-dawnguard
files.changelogHtml:
Prices now update in dialogue. (travel once to update)
Added 10x linear version, for non-dawnguard version as well.
